name: Wyyyschokk
description: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* 12 (2d8 + 3) kinetic damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

name: Wyyyschokk
description: *Ranged Weapon Attack:* +6 to hit, reach 30/60 ft., one target. *Hit:* 12 (2d8 + 3) kinetic damage, one creature. Hit: The target is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a DC 12 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to kinetic, poison, and psychic damage).

name: Zombie, Swarm
description:
A detached clump of corpses sprint at a creature the swarm can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or take 14 (3d8) kinetic damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it becomes entombed in dead flesh.
A creature entombed in the dead flesh is restrained, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the dead flesh, and takes 10 (3d6) kinetic damage at the start of each of its turns. The creature can be freed if the dead flesh is destroyed. The dead flesh is a Large object with AC 10, 25 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

name: Trooper, Shadow
description: The trooper targets a 10 foot cube within 90/360 feet. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, or takes 11 (1d12+4) Energy damage. A target beyond 80 feet makes the save with advantage.

name: Trooper, Shadow
description: The trooper throws a grenade at a point within 40 feet. Each creature within 10 feet must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature is blinded for 1 minute. At the start of an affected creature’s turn, it can repeat this save, ending the effect on a success.

name: Trooper, EVO
description: The trooper targets a 10 foot cube within 60 feet with burst fire. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, or takes 7 (1d6+3) Energy damage.

name: Trooper, EVO
description: The trooper fires a volley of flechettes in a 45-foot long, 5-foot wide line, originating from itself. Each creature in the line must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 (2d10) Kinetic damage on failure or half as much on success.

name: Roggwart
description: Each creature of the roggwart's choice that is within 120 feet of the roggwart and aware of it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the roggwart's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

name: Fireteam: Trooper
description: The fireteam fires en masse at a point within 150 feet Each creature of the squad's choice in a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 (4d8) energy damage, or 9 (2d8) energy damage if the squad has half its hit points or fewer. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage.

name: Trooper, Demolitions
description: The trooper throws a grenade, choosing a point within 35 feet. Each creature within 10 feet must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 2d6 kinetic damage on a failed save, or half as much as on a successful one.

name: Trooper, Demolitions
description: After setting this mine, a laser line imperceptible to normal vision extends up to 15 feet out. When the laser is tripped, the mine explodes, and each creature within 15 feet of it must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 3d6 kinetic damage, or half as much on a successful one.

name: Trooper, Demolitions
description: After spending at least 30 seconds setting the charge, the trooper may attach the charge to a surface. The charge can be set with a 6-second timer, or detonated remotely using a remote detonator, which the trooper has. Once detonated, the breaching charge destroys an unenhanced section of wall up to 10 feet wide, 10 feet tall, and 5 feet deep. Additionally, each creature within 20 feet of the charge must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 fire damage and 3d6 kinetic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. A construct makes this save with disadvantage. If the breaching charge is installed on the construct, it automatically fails the saving throw.

name: Squad: Trooper, Demolitions
description: The fireteam throws grenades, choosing two points within 45 feet. Each creature within 10 feet must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 4d6 kinetic damage on a failed save, or half as much as on a successful one.

name: Squad: Trooper, Demolitions
description: After setting this mine, a laser line imperceptible to normal vision extends up to 15 feet out. When the laser is tripped, the mine explodes, and each creature within 15 feet of it must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 3d6 kinetic damage, or half as much on a successful one.

name: Squad: Trooper, Demolitions

Additionally, each creature within 20 feet of the charge must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 fire damage and 3d6 kinetic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. A construct makes this save with disadvantage. If the breaching charge is installed on the construct, it automatically fails the saving throw.

name: Fireteam: Trooper, Flame
description: Each creature in a 30-foot cone must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 15 (4d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

name: Squad: Trooper, Flame
description: Each creature in a 45-foot cone must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 15 (4d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.
